name: Copernicus
author: wiredot

sections.description:
Copernicus has few handy features:

  • Smarty templating engine
  • Multi Language Capabilities
  • Image thumbnail creator with filters and additional tools (phpThumb)
  • Custom Post Types (generated from configuration files)
  • Meta Boxes with multiple fields (generated from configuration files)
  • Additional fields for Users
  • Additional fields for Taxonomies
  • Admin List View (ability do edit order and add custom columns to list view in wp-admin)
  • Cleanup of some unwanted WordPress output
  • Easily add CSS files
  • Easily add JS files
  • Customizer options generated from configuration files
  • Debugin tools
  • Location tools
  • Custom menus and navigations
  • Custom rewrite rules
  • Option pages generated from configuration files
  • Translation panel in backend
sections.installation:
1. Upload the Copernicus plugin to your plugins folder.
  2. Activate it.
  3. You’re done!

To see what Copernicus can do, try one of the demo themes:

  • Copernicus Prime – demo theme (https://github.com/wiredot/copernicus-prime)

short_description: Copernicus is a set of tools that make creating themes more efficient. Copernicus is in experimental mode. Use at your own risk!
